profile.name: ABDALLAH SABBAGH
profile.title: Mobile & Web
profile.subtitle: I Build things for
profile.description: I'm a software developer with a passion for building exceptional digital experiences. With a focus on creative solutions and a love for design, I'm dedicated to exceeding my clients' expectations. Let's work together to create something amazing!

projects.title: SHAYV
projects.subtitle: Mobile App
projects.description: Shayv is a salon services app that brings the salon to you, wherever you are. Whether you're at work, home, gym, or even the park, Shayv offers a wide range of services for both men and kids. With Shayv, you can book an appointment with your preferred stylist and have them come to your location at your convenience. The app offers a seamless user experience, with easy booking and payment options, making it the ultimate on-demand salon experience.

projects.title: ADIHEX
projects.subtitle: Mobile App
projects.description: Adihex is the ultimate event guide and companion app, designed to enhance your event experience. With Adihex, you can easily plan your visit to the exhibition, explore the event's various features, and be entertained with built-in mobile games and edutainment. Onsite, the app enables you to present your e-ticket at the gates for quick and seamless access to the exhibition halls and conference and workshop theaters, allowing you to maximize your time at the event.

description: Perform maintenance and software integrations for existing systems.

Work with third-party dependencies and APIs.
